issue.title: Future enhancement: Droppable communications repeater nodes

content.raw: As a smaller but related change, another nice feature would be having some sort of queryable data storage on the basestation. E.g. adding `set(X, Y)` and `get(X)` commands. This could help robots share data and coordinate their artifact reports when they’re near the entrance.
